mapper.select: SELECT o.list_id, u.name, o.product_name, o.option_name, hi.hname AS hospital_name, o.purchase_date, o.purchase_quantity, pi.product_count AS remaining_quantity FROM order_list o INNER JOIN userinfo u ON o.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN hospital_info hi ON o.hcode = hi.hcode INNER JOIN product_info pi ON o.product_id = pi.product_id
